content: this really is my favorite crochet dishcloth pattern it makes a very nice solid stitch and works up quickly and rather mindlessly one person made a dozen of these in one weekend as gifts my favorite dish cloth materials sz h aluminum hook 1 oz worsted wt cotton yarn chain 32 or any even number round 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn round 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 1 skip next st single_crochet in next st across chain 1 and turn round 3 single_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next chain space single_crochet in next single_crochet across chain 1 and turn round 4 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet across chain 1 and turn repeat row 3 & 4 until desired length final row single_crochet in each st across finish off if desired single_crochet around all edges putting 3 single_crochet in each corner note cloth also looks nice in variegated yarn ©2000 please note all of my patterns are free for your use you may print out as many as you wish and i encourage you to share with friends please keep my name and copyright mark with all my patterns please do not post this to any email list and please don t post this on any other website feel free to link directly to any of my pages - drop me a line if you do
